title: Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: One of the evils in a dream is the dream that causes anxiety and fear in dreamers, knowing that a large number of dream interpreters have interpreted this vision, knowing that the interpretations are not the same, as they differ according to the social position of the dreamer and the dreamer in whom he saw the dream. In the following lines, we will discuss the interpretations in detail. Feces in a dream. Feces in a dream and scattered everywhere is a sign that the profits and money that the dreamer has obtained in the recent period are from suspicious sources. Cleaning feces in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of everything that has worried him in the past period and his life will be stable in general. A large number of dream interpreters confirmed that feces in a dream is a sign of turmoil in the dreamer's affairs, especially the things that he has been trying to achieve for some time. As for the one who sees that feces are in his clothes, it indicates that he will suffer a great loss in the near future, knowing that it will take a long time before he can compensate for this loss. Feces in a dream reflect the number of wrong decisions that the dreamer has made in the recent period, knowing that they will negatively affect his life and he will find himself surrounded by a large number of problems. As for the one who seeks to achieve something, the dream indicates that he will be exposed to a large number of obstacles and obstacles in his way. Feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a chair in a dream is one of the visions that carry a set of interpretations and meanings. Here are the most important things mentioned: Defecating in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is the ideal friend for everyone around him, as he keeps secrets and hides secrets. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing feces in a dream is a sign that the dreamer may enter into an emotional relationship in the coming period. As for the one who dreams of not being able to defecate, this indicates that he will face many problems in his life and will find it difficult to find appropriate solutions for them. Feces in a dream is a sign of the dreamer's need to stay away from the path of disobedience and sins and get closer to God Almighty through good deeds. What does feces mean in Imam Al-Sadiq's dream? Imam Al-Sadiq indicated that seeing feces in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will fall into many problems and crises, especially financial crises. As for the patient and saw himself getting rid of feces in the bathroom, this is a sign of recovery from illness and the stability of the dreamer's health condition in the coming days. Feces in general are impurity, and it is an indication that the dreamer has committed many sins and disobedience, which distanced him from God Almighty, so he needs to re-examine himself before it is too late. Feces in a dream for a woman Seeing feces in a single person’s dream is one of the dreams that causes a state of disgust in the dreamer, however, it carries a large number of connotations, and here are the most prominent of them: Feces in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence that she is surrounded by many bad friends who do not wish her well, but they are trying all the time to get her into trouble. Feces in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that she is worried

title: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream or dream through the vision website Roy2a.com. Seeing a tiger in a dream indicates wealth, power, abundance of money, and overcoming difficulties. A wild tiger indicates bad friends, cunning, and deception, and attacking a tiger indicates problems and troubles. We will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing a tiger. In a dream, providing interpretations of the vision in a dream of a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a single girl. And a divorced woman and a widow, and presenting the interpretations of the leading imams in interpreting visions and dreams, ancient and modern, follow us on the Vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a tiger in a dream indicates success, superiority, and strength of character. Seeing a tiger trapped in a cage or in the zoo indicates On weakness, humiliation, and the inability to make sound decisions. Seeing a predatory tiger attack in a dream indicates the danger that surrounds the world from everywhere. Seeing a tiger escaping indicates the end of worry and anxiety and escaping from danger. Seeing a tiger attack indicates failure and many problems and difficulties. Seeing A tiger bite in a dream indicates harm and may indicate illness. See also: Interpretation of seeing feces from cats, animals, or mice in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a tiger in a dream for a single woman It portends good luck and marriage to a man who has power, authority, and status Seeing a tiger skin in a dream for a girl indicates dowry and courtship. If an unmarried girl sees that she is playing with a tiger, it portends good luck and her marriage to a strong and brave young man. Seeing a tiger attacking in a single woman’s dream shows many admirers. See also: Interpretation of seeing animal blood in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a tiger? In a dream for a married woman: Seeing a tiger in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her marital life and family and familial ties. If a married woman sees that she is kissing or petting a tiger, this indicates good luck and abundance of money. If a married woman sees a nice and gentle tiger, this indicates buying a new house or A new car may indicate a successful marital relationship and a friendly relationship between them. If a married woman sees a predatory tiger attacking her, it indicates many problems, marital disputes, problems and difficulties that she faces. See also: Interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a tiger in the house in A dream of a pregnant woman announces a very good, friendly and happy relationship with her husband and children. If a pregnant woman sees a tiger, it indicates the birth of a boy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing a green shirt, it indicates the birth of a girl. What is the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for a divorced woman: A vision of escaping from a tiger in a dream Divorcee indicates overcoming adversity and difficulties. If a divorced woman sees that she is being chased by a tiger, she says someone wants to marry her. See Tiger Market, it indicates acquaintance with notables, people of influence, power, and leadership. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bee in a dream. What is the interpretation of a tiger in a dream? Al-Usaimi: Seeing a pet tiger in a dream. To overcome obstacles and difficulties and fight enemies

title: Interpretation of a dream about jinn and reading the Qur’an

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of a dream about jinn and recitation of the Qur’an. It is known that we are all afraid and terrified as soon as the name of the jinn is mentioned. Also, seeing jinn in a dream is considered unpleasant, but if this vision is followed by recitation of the Qur’an, this indicates the appearance of anxiety and confusion in the person who had this vision. To learn more about this confusing vision, we present to you today, through our website, an encyclopedia and interpretation of the dream of the jinn and the recitation of the Qur’an, whether the fortune teller is about a man or a woman, as well as for single and divorced women, by more than one scholar, including Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, so follow us... Interpretation of the dream of the jinn and reading the Qur’an What a beautiful feeling of comfort after reading the Qur’an. Likewise, in a dream, if a person sees that he is reading the Qur’an correctly, it is a good sign for him and the approach of relief. Although seeing jinn in a dream is abhorrent, its effect is negated by reciting the Qur’an, and this varies depending on the state of the vision. And also his gender if he is male, female, or single. Interpretation of a dream about reciting the Qur’an to expel the jinn from unmarried women. Seeing the jinn in a dream indicates that she is committing many mistakes in her life and they must stop immediately, as well as the necessity of resorting to God and getting close to Him and asking for forgiveness and pardon for the mistakes that arose from them. Or her money may be stolen soon, so be careful. Sometimes it is a sign of meeting someone who will deceive her and hurt her heart a lot. Interpretation of seeing jinn in a dream while reading the Qur’an by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the jinn and reciting the Qur’an over him to expel him predicts many things, including: If the sleeper sees jeans He enters the house, this indicates that there are people around him who represent friendship, but in reality they are enemies and do not love you well. In addition, a thief can rob the house, so you have to pay a lot of attention to him. If the verse read in a dream is Ayat al-Kursi, then this is a sign that the enemies will soon get rid of him and he may be affected by some magic and evil, but he will be saved by God. God Almighty willing. But if it is Surah Al-Falaq, the sleeper may soon be affected by witchcraft and envy, but thanks to God, he will be saved from it and will not be harmed. When a woman sees jeans, this indicates the theft of her money and her meeting with swindlers and hypocrites. Seeing jeans in a dream and reading the Qur’an for a married woman. Seeing jinn in a dream and reading The Qur’an on it and its disappearance before her eyes indicates that there will be some problems between her and her husband, and it is better for her to read the Holy Qur’an a lot. Especially Ayat Al-Kursi. It can mean alleviating one’s fears and alleviating all of one’s problems. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn and reading Surat Al-Fatihah. Reciting Surat Al-Fatihah is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds goodness and God’s care for it: May God protect the dreamer from evil and envy, whether it is from humans or jinn. .Protection from falling into the evil of worldly strife. Solving the problems facing a person, and soon worries will go away, and all things will calm down, God willing. Al-Nabulsi’s opinion on interpreting a dream about jinn and reciting the Qur’an. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing the jinn and hearing verses of the Holy Quran is a sign of attaining a position or raising the status of the dreamer. If he is sick, God will prescribe a relative for him

title: Interpretation of dreams about urinating on clothes

preview.html: Interpretation of urinating on clothes for unmarried women: It is possible to see an unmarried girl in a dream urinating on clothes, and in the interpretation of this dream we find the following: If an unmarried girl dreams that a young child is urinating on her clothes, this is evidence that the girl will get rid of envious people in her life. While it appears This vision means that the girl is committing some mistakes against her. This dream also shows that the girl is hiding many secrets from others and does not want anyone to know about them. If an unmarried girl sees herself urinating on her clothes, this is evidence that she is committing many sins, and she must repent sincerely. Seeing urine on clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman means that the girl hears a lot of happy news. Then if the unmarried girl sees that she is urinating on her shirt, this is evidence that she is blessed with knowledge and prestige. Interpretation of the appearance of urination on clothes for a married woman. There is no doubt that you are seeing a married woman. In a dream, she urinates on her clothes, and among the most important interpretations given in interpreting this vision we find the following: If a married woman dreams that she urinates on her clothes, this indicates that the woman is hiding many things related to her married life. This vision also shows that the woman hears happy news about Pregnancy after losing hope in it. However, if a woman dreams that her young child is urinating on her clothes, this is evidence that the woman is going through many obstacles in her life and needs help. Also, urinating on clothes in a dream indicates that the woman is suffering from problems with her husband, but Soon it will end well. See also: A detailed interpretation of urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of urinating on clothes for a pregnant woman. There are many interpretations that explain the reality of seeing a pregnant woman urinating on her clothes, the most important of which are the following: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is urinating on her clothes, This means that the time of birth is approaching. This dream also indicates that the woman will obtain many material gains after giving birth. While that vision is interpreted that the baby is a male by God’s command. If a pregnant woman sees a small child urinating on her clothes, this indicates that the woman She suffers from deteriorating health after giving birth. This dream also shows that the newborn will have a great status in the future by God’s command. Urinating on clothes in the dream also indicates her good relationship with her husband and her husband’s family. You may be interested: Urinating in a dream is good news. Interpretation of a vision Urine on clothes for a divorced woman. There are many interpretations that have been received that explain the fact that a divorced woman sees herself urinating on her clothes, the most important of which are the following: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is urinating on her clothes, this indicates that the woman is suffering from a bad psychological state. This vision also indicates The woman will hear a lot of happy news in the near future. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is urinating on her clothes in the street. Evidence of the woman’s fear of revealing some secrets from others. Urinating on the clothes is evidence of the woman committing many bad deeds.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood in a dream is the correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream. Through this article, God Almighty said: “O leaders, advise me regarding my dreams, if I see visions (43), then blood is one of the things that many do not prefer to see in our dreams. Strange things emerge in the interpretation, and we may see strange things. They are either self-talk from Satan, or true visions from Almighty God to the seer, and God alone knows the unseen. Below is an encyclopedia that we present. Different interpretations of seeing blood in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream by Ibn Sirina. The appearance of blood in a dream in general indicates in a dream that the dreamer has earned forbidden money, It also indicates the sins and misdeeds committed by the individual. If a person sees blood stains on his clothes in a dream. This vision symbolizes the great deception that this person will be exposed to by the people around him. Seeing a person drinking the blood of one of his acquaintances and relatives expresses his help in some important matters in their lives. And in the event that he sees that he is drinking the blood of people he does not know. This vision indicates that some sad things will happen to some people. But if he sees that he is spitting blood from his mouth, this vision is unpleasant and indicates that something bad will happen to the person who sees it. Seeing blood coming out of the body without a wound in the skin indicates that the fortuneteller has lost his senses. His money. If an unmarried girl sees menstruation in her dream. This vision indicates that she will get married soon. But if the old lady sees menstrual bleeding. This vision expresses a serious illness that you will suffer from. Seeing warm blood in a dream. The foul smell symbolizes the person who is seen committing many sins and misdeeds. If one sees a lot of blood bleeding everywhere. This vision expresses the loss of someone close to him or the loss of his money. As for the vision of blood coming out of the arteries; It indicates the extreme poverty of the dreamer, or extreme sadness for the loss of a loved one. Interpretation of seeing a river of blood in a dreamIf one sees in a dream a river of blood somewhere. This vision expresses that this person will have an accident in the place where he saw the river of blood in reality and that he will bleed profusely. The person who swims in the river of blood in a dream represents the dreamer’s profit from forbidden money, while he is unable to get rid of this money. Seeing hands stained with blood represents The forbidden money that the dreamer earns, but he will get rid of it and benefit others. As for seeing falling into a bowl full of blood? This vision shows that the dreamer commits many sins and misdeeds. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that blood is flowing from someone in front of her. This vision symbolizes the new life that awaits this woman and also indicates the end of her sorrows. If she sees someone bleeding in front of her, this vision expresses that she has been in an accident and will face some sad things in the coming period, but they will pass safely. But if she sees that her hand is bleeding, this vision expresses The loss of many important matters and that God Almighty will compensate them with goodness. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a single woman if she sees

But if she sees that her hand is bleeding, this vision expresses The loss of many important matters and that God Almighty will compensate them with goodness. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a spy in a dream is complete evidence of the dreamer’s involvement in some difficult matters. preview.html: We will learn about seeing a green chameleon in a dream and whether it is good or bad and its interpretations for everyone, married, single or male, through this article. Green chameleon in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a green chameleon in a dream, this means that the unmarried woman will get a lot. Of good nutrition and abundance in the near future. A green chameleon entering the house is a sign of the goodness that the people of the house will receive soon. When an unmarried woman dreams that someone gives her a gray chameleon, this indicates that the young man wants to marry her. While an unmarried woman sees someone He brings more than one chameleon to her home, this is evidence that she will soon reach a high position. And when an unmarried woman dreams of a green chameleon sitting on the furniture of the house, this indicates that there is a lot of goodness and solution to the problems that the unmarried woman suffers from in her life. During Seeing a single girl feeding a green chameleon in a dream, this indicates that there is compassion in her heart and that she loves everyone. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a green chameleon in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream showing affection for a green chameleon means that she will be healthy. Good in her life. When a married woman dreams that she enters a room with a green chameleon, this indicates a lot of good that she will receive. Also, when a married woman sees a green chameleon drinking from her shoe, this is evidence that the married woman will enjoy a peaceful life with her husband. When A married woman dreams that her husband gives her a green chameleon, this means that she will give birth to a female. When a married woman dreams of the sound of a chameleon in a dream, this is a sign of goodness, and this will happen in her home. Interpretation of seeing a green chameleon in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a separate green chameleon means that she will benefit greatly From the presence of a chameleon in her home. Also, seeing a divided green chameleon lifting it is evidence of good news soon. While a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is offering her a green chameleon, this is evidence that the divorced woman wants to return to her. While seeing a green chameleon hurting the divorced woman is evidence of the presence of problems and many Among the problems that a divorced woman will face in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a green chameleon in a dream for young men: Seeing a small chameleon in a dream has a number of important connotations, as the man is raising a chameleon at home. It indicates that there will be great gains for the person. Also, to see a man feeding a chameleon This is a sign of abundant goodness that will come to the person. Seeing a green chameleon in a dream for a man means good company. Also, if a man sees the sound of a chameleon in a dream, this indicates a high status for the person. And when a woman dreams that she is raising a chameleon in a dream, this indicates that he There will be an end to worries, sorrows, and a solution to problems. When one dreams of a dark-colored chameleon, this is a sign of difficulties that will end soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirint.

title: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the Vision roy2a.com website, as seeing a cake in a dream and buying it. A sign of family stability and a happy life for the visionary, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article on the single girl, married, pregnant, man, young man and divorced. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman seeing a cake in a dream? A divorced woman seeing in a dream and she received a gift from her ex-husband, and she was beautiful in shape, indicating that he brought her good and abundant sustenance through him. The final vision of getting a large cake from a stranger is a sign of her relationship with a righteous man who has high morals and brings her happiness and psychological peace. See also: Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream for a man? A man sees a cake in a dream Introducing her to a beautiful girl and his great interest in her is a sign of the strength of love and emotional connection between them and the beginning of a happy and peaceful life. Seeing a man receiving a cake gift in a dream It indicates the opening of wide doors of livelihood for him through a job or a great opportunity or getting a big promotion at work. See also: Interpretation of seeing burial in a dream What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a cake in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman with a cake in a dream and preparing it for her children is evidence of her easy birth and easy birth And her sustenance with children who will be fair to her and bring her tremendous good. A pregnant woman's dream of offering a large and beautiful cake to her husband indicates enjoying great family stability and the presence of happiness and great love between them. What is the interpretation of a single young man who sees a cake in a dream? Seeing an unmarried young man talking about a cake in a dream and her big birthdays and feeling happy with them is evidence of the abundance of sustenance that he will transfer to them. Seeing a young man making a large and beautiful cake in a dream and after many failed attempts, this indicates that he is striving for many things that do not benefit him, and that God will grant him success in the end. See also: Interpretation of seeing a monastery in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a single girl eating a cake in a dream? Seeing a single girl eating a cake in a dream is a statement of good conditions and enjoying health, well-being and psychological peace. A single woman sees a colorful cake in a dream is a sign of hearing happy and joyful news soon. Seeing a yellow cake in a dream is an indication of ill health and serious illness. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a cake in a dream? Seeing a married woman eating a cake in a dream and it was large in size and beautiful in shape, indicating the presence of stability and reassurance between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman giving her husband a large cake is a sign of strength Love, affection and kindness between them. Seeing the purchase of a large cake in a married woman’s dream indicates overcoming difficulties and problems and the ability to solve marital problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing a green orchard in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a cake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates his pressures, great responsibilities and great patience

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch: If a person sees in his dream a wristwatch as a gift and continues to look at it throughout his dream. This is a sign that he is waiting for something very important in his life. And if he sees that the watch in his sleep has a malfunction, and it needs to be repaired. This is a sign of destruction, a sign of mistakes Which he went through throughout his life. And that there is an imbalance in his livelihood and his dealings with people, it is an indication of the late age of marriage. Al-Usaimi also believes that if a person sees a wristwatch as a gift in a dream, and when he sees it he finds himself working hard, this will be a sign of the livelihood that will happen to the dreamer in his life. Soon.Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch, a gift for individualsIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a wristwatch is a gift, and she is happy about it. This is a sign that he will hear good news soon. As for the case, the watch was a gift and it was not working. This is a sign of damage that she will suffer From him in her life, even if she took the watch from someone she knows. This may indicate that her relationship with this person will be bad in the future. Also, if he sees in a dream that the gift watch is working since he was unemployed. This is an indication that there are some obstacles in The path to his success, but he will return with strength and vitality after a while. It is worth noting that the unmarried woman saw herself receiving a wristwatch as a gift from an unknown young man. This is a sign that he will communicate with someone soon. The nature of the relationship is known by the shape and quality of the watch. The more expensive the watch is, the richer the person who She will have a relationship with him and with whom she will find happiness. Likewise, if she sees in a dream a watch that is not good and does not work, and a stranger gave it to her. This is a sign that she will marry someone with whom she had bad relations and problems will fill her house, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of the dream For a black watch. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch, a gift for a married woman. If a married woman sees that a wristwatch is a gift in her dream, she will be very happy with the gift. This is a sign that she will get something that will make her happy. Also, if she sees in a dream that her husband is giving her a wristwatch. This will be a sign On the amount of love and affection between them. But if he buys her a lot of gifts in a dream, this is a sign that he is giving her all her rights and meeting all her needs. And if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband gave her a watch as a gift, and she sees that there is a woman trying to take it from her because she loves it. The vision shows that her relationship with her husband is strong, which makes a certain woman jealous of her and tries to spoil her relationship with him. That is why a married woman must keep the secrets of her home, and every event that concerns her and her relationship with her husband, so that she does not envy this blessing. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch, a gift for a woman Pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that someone is giving her two watches as a gift. This is a sign that she will give birth to twins, God willing. What if she sees that one of the two watches fell and an hour remained in her hand? It may be a sign of the death of one of her children, and God knows best. And if she took it for only an hour As a gift, this is a sign that she is pregnant with the only child, and God is the Most High. What if she saw in her dream that she was wearing a watch and

title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy and childbirth for a married woman

preview.html: The world of dreams is a very wide world full of mysterious topics and is one of the most intriguing areas, and therefore many are interested in finding a way to interpret signs and signs in dreams, and dreams related to marriage, pregnancy, and childbirth are among the most common dreams among men and women, and we will refer in this article on the encyclopedia website Interpretation of a Dream Pregnancy and childbirth for a married womanFor an unmarried and divorced woman, the interpretation of a dream varies according to the situation, whether male or female, and social status affects the interpretation of the dream. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy and childbirth for a married woman Over the centuries, there have been many dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, and they have written books and volumes that refer to scientific methods for interpreting dreams that are still used today. By analogy, dreams are dream interpretation scholars see that every symbol, every sign, and every piece of evidence in a dream has a special meaning, and no sign in a dream came by chance. But dream interpretation is a science that can be true or false, and therefore it can be looked at out of curiosity and break the cycle of ambiguity. About dreams, but he cannot be relied upon to make decisive decisions in Zoe. With reference to the opinions of dream interpreters, the interpretation of a dream about pregnancy and childbirth for a married woman may mean following an extensive diet, God willing, that will fill the dreamer’s house. Seeing children is a blessing and a great livelihood, God willing. They relied on In their opinion, this refers to the words of God Almighty in Surat Al-Kahf: “Wealth and children are the adornment of this world” (46). Children are adornments and pride, and the parents will be very happy if God blesses them. And if God has not yet blessed a married woman with children, and she sees in her dream that she is pregnant and has given birth to a child. Healthy and sound, this dream is a good omen, God willing, about the imminent feeding of her. . Goodness has returned, and God knows best. An easy birth in a dream is often associated with goodness and great living, God willing. If the dreamer is happy in her dream, this means that, God willing, she will enter a new phase in her life full of happiness, food, and blessings. Seeing children in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need for gratitude. God Almighty said in Surah An-Naml: “Say: No one in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except God” (65). Just individual opinions. If a woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant and giving birth, and her birth was difficult and she is suffering from severe pain, this means that she is going through distress and a major crisis in her life and is unable to overcome it smoothly. This distress may be related to family issues, such as the presence of disagreements between her and Her husband, or financial problems such as heavy debts or the like. This dream shows her urgent desire to escape this distress. But if the birth was easy in the dream and without great pain, then this indicates the proximity of the womb, God willing, and that there is a lot of goodness on the way to it. If he expects a promotion at work, he will get it, God willing

This distress may be related to family issues, such as the presence of disagreements between her and Her husband, or financial problems such as heavy debts or the like. This dream shows her urgent desire to escape this distress. But if the birth was easy in the dream and without great pain, then this indicates the proximity of the womb, God willing, and that there is a lot of goodness on the way to it. If he expects a promotion at work, he will get it, God willing
